name: Verify special notice period field in billing for endorsement transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Verify special notice period field in billing for endorsement transaction ({RiskState=California, specialnoticeperiod=10})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy for LOB Workers Compensation

And with insured address and location details
| StreetAddress | Line2 | City | State | Zip | Country |
| 47 W 13th St |  | South Portland | California | 10011 |  |
And with Primary State 'California'

And with Risk State
| California |
| New York |
And underwriter creates WK policy
And policy is created successfully
When underwriter performs endorsement on policy
And selects Risk State as 'Maine'
And underwriter books policy
Then the 10 for California should be reflected in Billing system

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter has ability to create policy for LOB Workers Compensation
And with insured address and location details
And with Primary State 'California'
And with Risk State
And underwriter creates WK policy
And policy is created successfully
When underwriter performs endorsement on policy
And selects Risk State as 'Maine'
And underwriter books policy
Then the <specialnoticeperiod> for <RiskState> should be reflected in Billing system
